title: Hardacre
description: THE HARDACRES - ONCE YOU MEET THEM YOU'LL NEVER FORGET THEM!Here is a saga throbbing with the passions of the generations - the chronicle of a dynasty born of one man's iron will and one woman's infinite love, and encompassing the intertwining lives of men and women who had only the Hardacre name and the Hardacre fortune in common.
author: C.L. Skelton
